evidence.text: (1) rescind any RIFs issued pursuant to Executive Order 14210

extracted.value: Rescind any RIFs issued pursuant to Executive Order 14210

evidence.text: (2) transfer any federal employees who were moved into administrative leave status to effectuate Executive Order 14210 back to the status they held prior to being placed on such leave

extracted.value: Transfer any federal employees who were moved into administrative leave status to effectuate Executive Order 14210 back to the status they held prior to being placed on such leave

evidence.text: (3) enjoin and/or stay from taking any actions to implement or enforce sections 3(c) and 3(e) of Executive Order 14210

extracted.value: Enjoin and/or stay from taking any actions to implement or enforce sections 3(c) and 3(e) of Executive Order 14210

evidence.text: (1) any further approval, disapproval, or certification of ARRPs by OMB and OPM, whether formal or informal, express or implied

extracted.value: Any further approval, disapproval, or certification of ARRPs by OMB and OPM, whether formal or informal, express or implied

evidence.text: (2) any further waivers of statutorily-mandated RIF notice periods by OMB and OPM, whether formal or informal, express or implied

extracted.value: Any further waivers of statutorily-mandated RIF notice periods by OMB and OPM, whether formal or informal, express or implied

evidence.text: (3) any further orders by DOGE, whether formal or informal

extracted.value: Any further orders by DOGE, whether formal or informal
